scenes.description: Opening title card and music for Shiori Novella's 3D Showcase.
A close-up of a blue door being knocked on and then opening.
Inside a magical library where books are flying and a main book opens to show a letter.
Shiori Novella reads her letter to her fans, the Novelites.
Shiori recalls her unsettling dreams of a strange courtyard.
Shiori's silhouette is shown as she describes her dreams growing in intensity.
Back in the library, Shiori explains her decision to seek out the location from her dreams.
Transition to the present day where Shiori arrives at the real-life location of the castle.

subtitles.original: Dear Novelites,
subtitles.english: Dear Novelites,

subtitles.original: I'm sorry to have left suddenly.
subtitles.english: I'm sorry to have left suddenly.

subtitles.original: Trust me, I didn't want to,
subtitles.english: Trust me, I didn't want to,

subtitles.original: but hopefully I'll be back soon.
subtitles.english: but hopefully I'll be back soon.

subtitles.original: If I'm not though, then you deserve to know what happened.
subtitles.english: If I'm not though, then you deserve to know what happened.

subtitles.original: Remember when I mentioned those unsettling dreams I've been getting?
subtitles.english: Remember when I mentioned those unsettling dreams I've been getting?

subtitles.original: I'm just in this courtyard, but
subtitles.english: I'm just in this courtyard, but

subtitles.original: everything feels off when I'm there.
subtitles.english: everything feels off when I'm there.

subtitles.original: Like, imagine if you lived your whole life underwater
subtitles.english: Like, imagine if you lived your whole life underwater

subtitles.original: and then one day you were on the surface.
subtitles.english: and then one day you were on the surface.

subtitles.original: There's something alien about that place.
subtitles.english: There's something alien about that place.

subtitles.original: And when Dream Me is there,
subtitles.english: And when Dream Me is there,

subtitles.original: I'm filled with a sense of being trapped.
subtitles.english: I'm filled with a sense of being trapped.

subtitles.original: It builds and...
subtitles.english: It builds and...

subtitles.original: well, lately I keep ending up in that courtyard every time I dream,
subtitles.english: well, lately I keep ending up in that courtyard every time I dream,

subtitles.original: which has made it hard for me to fall asleep.
subtitles.english: which has made it hard for me to fall asleep.

subtitles.original: I was hoping the dreams would fade
subtitles.english: I was hoping the dreams would fade

subtitles.original: so I could continue with my normal routine.
subtitles.english: so I could continue with my normal routine.

subtitles.original: But since then, they've only grown in intensity.
subtitles.english: But since then, they've only grown in intensity.

subtitles.original: Finally, I just couldn't take it anymore.
subtitles.english: Finally, I just couldn't take it anymore.

subtitles.original: I'd seen that distant castle in my dreams enough times
subtitles.english: I'd seen that distant castle in my dreams enough times

subtitles.original: to be able to write a detailed description of it.
subtitles.english: to be able to write a detailed description of it.

subtitles.original: When I did some research,
subtitles.english: When I did some research,

subtitles.original: I found a place just like it in the real world, so I have to go there.
subtitles.english: I found a place just like it in the real world, so I have to go there.

subtitles.original: It might seem crazy, but there's something in the corner
subtitles.english: It might seem crazy, but there's something in the corner

subtitles.original: of my mind that's pulling me towards it.
subtitles.english: of my mind that's pulling me towards it.

subtitles.original: And I think if I do it, the dreams will finally stop.
subtitles.english: And I think if I do it, the dreams will finally stop.

subtitles.original: Sorry again for not telling you how bad things have gotten.
subtitles.english: Sorry again for not telling you how bad things have gotten.

subtitles.original: The truth is, it wasn't something I wanted to deal with.
subtitles.english: The truth is, it wasn't something I wanted to deal with.

subtitles.original: I wanted our time together to be fun and full of smiles,
subtitles.english: I wanted our time together to be fun and full of smiles,

subtitles.original: tangents, multiple tangents, non-stop tangents,
subtitles.english: tangents, multiple tangents, non-stop tangents,

subtitles.original: and this just kept getting in the way.
subtitles.english: and this just kept getting in the way.

subtitles.original: So, I'm going to take care of it
subtitles.english: So, I'm going to take care of it

subtitles.original: and then go back to my happy sugar life.
subtitles.english: and then go back to my happy sugar life.

subtitles.original: So, yeah. See you soon!
subtitles.english: So, yeah. See you soon!

subtitles.original: Present Day
subtitles.english: Present Day

subtitles.original: Well, this is the place.
subtitles.english: Well, this is the place.

subtitles.original: Come on, Shiori. Get this over with
subtitles.english: Come on, Shiori. Get this over with

subtitles.original: and then you can go back to them.
subtitles.english: and then you can go back to them.

subtitles.original: Huh?
subtitles.english: Huh?
